node.data: {"title":"Academic Conferences","details":["The purpose of this day is to give both students and researchers the opportunity to share their work.","If you have a paper that you would like to share with others NLP enthusiasts, sign up to present at the Nitro Conferences.","What you will need in order to apply:","- a scientific paper or research work, published or not published, personal or as part of a team","- a 10-30 minutes presentation - don\"t worry if you don\"t have one already, you can submit a draft just to give us an idea as to where in the day\"s plan it would fit best","- a few words about yourself and the way you\"re related to the mentioned fields (e.g. work / study / research experience)","All applications are subject to a screening process to ensure that they are related to NLP, ML, AI etc. After the registration closes, our team will help you prepare your slides and speech for the big day."],"button":"apply","link":"Attend Conferences","endDescription":"The academic conference has ended. See you next year!"}
